channel.title: [317] Strangest thing
channel.description:
For some reason, when I try to equip an item that is not a custom item, it won't let me. But any item's that were put into my source-through the client, (e.g. Dragon claws-14464) I can equip, or wear just fine.
I know this is the case because if I use an old 317 client, which is basic, and does not support custom's yet. I am able to equip/wear any item I desire.
Would anyone happen to know why this is? I am positive this is a server-side problem, because I haven't done any client work yet, I'm just using the client that came with this source. It's your typical Delta source.
[b][size=14pt]Note: I'm sorry if this was the wrong section, it is a server-side problem. But, I believe the client is causing this server-side problem. Which is weird. I wasn't sure or not. If this is the wrong section, please move this thread. [/size][/b]
Anyone who can help, I appreciate it!

item.title: [317] Strangest thing
item.dc:creator: @MyNameIsDylan MyNameIsDylan
item.description:
@MyNameIsDylan wrote:

For some reason, when I try to equip an item that is not a custom item, it won’t let me. But any item’s that were put into my source-through the client, (e.g. Dragon claws-14464) I can equip, or wear just fine.

I know this is the case because if I use an old 317 client, which is basic, and does not support custom’s yet. I am able to equip/wear any item I desire.

Would anyone happen to know why this is? I am positive this is a server-side problem, because I haven’t done any client work yet, I’m just using the client that came with this source. It’s your typical Delta source.

[size=14pt]Note: I’m sorry if this was the wrong section, it is a server-side problem. But, I believe the client is causing this server-side problem. Which is weird. I wasn’t sure or not. If this is the wrong section, please move this thread. [/size]

Anyone who can help, I appreciate it!
